UPDATE: After political theater on Senate floor today, I‚Äôm pleased to report that real, bipartisan discussions have now begun on next round of Emergency #Coronavirus funding. We need to fix & enhance #PPP & take comprehensive approach to helping #smallbiz, hospitals, & states.

Congress must work together to get money into the hands of those bearing the brunt of #COVID19 pandemic. We must provide bipartisan remedies to promote public health & protect the economic well-being of people, communities, & Main Street businesses. We‚Äôre all in this together!

Nobody wants to hear this, but we're still in the early stages of the battle vs. #COVID19. We can get it under control. But to stop it from returning, we can't allow our defenses to crumble. We must invest more in testing, hospitals & health workers, #PPE, research, & vaccine.

States & communities are facing stark decisions & taking bold, decisive action to save lives. The Trump Admin must support them or they could face financial ruin. #CARESAct included $150B for states, but that is a drop in the bucket. We must do more to help communities nationwide

Hospitals, health centers, & primary care practices are cornerstones of our communities & public health. If they collapse under the strain of #COVID19, everyone suffers. Congress must work together to bolster our health system to keep people & the economy healthy.

States, hospitals, families, & #smallbiz are all pleading for additional federal help. Congress & Trump must listen & act. Safeguarding the health & well-being of ALL Americans -- not just the powerful -- requires smart & comprehensive strategy. The Admin must do a better job!

More help is needed.
Congress should quickly deliver additional aid to families, hospitals & health centers, small businesses & employees, communities & states.
Time is of the essence.

Americans want principled leaders to work together & get things done. If Sen. McConnell really wanted to help small businesses, he‚Äôd skip the theater & get right to work. Families, hospitals, & states need more help too.

Sen. McConnell is performing a bit of political theater, requesting only $250B for #smallbiz.

Then real work of negotiating & legislating begins...
